attributes.action: put up the price of milk by 30p per ltr  and it goes straight to the farmer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: where is our milk going to come from if all the milk farmers go bust.we will all end up with milk powders,so i propose we increase milk by 30 pence per ltr and it goes direct to the farmer.just trhink how much we pay for a small bottle of soft drinks and the dont need feed and vet care.by the way im a townie and not connected to farmers in any way but can see a wrong when i see one.the supermarkets need to hang there heads in shame with whats going on in our dairy farms or whats left of them...
